name: Gutshof Zillertal- Restaurant Mei Tirol
description:
Mei Tirol Restaurantâ€“ a typical Tyrolean "Guest House" lovingly designed with stone pine furniture and cockle stove, black and white pictures on the walls remembers of the good old times. Romantic candle light dinner with tirolean food, delicious steak arrangements, local drinks or a good wine from our cellar. Look forward for an excellent meal in restaurant's cozy lounge or in the garden area.
